name: I Need To Go Home, But This World Is Better!
name_original: I Need To Go Home, But This World Is Better!
description:
Y'know the deal: Protagonist dies and gets sent to some fantasy land! That's most Isekai's, that is.

I Need To Go Home, But This World Is Better! is a Parodic Take on the Isekai Genre as a whole. The game aims to poke fun, but never insult it's target audience. 

You Play as The Protagonist (Character is Namable) as he makes his way to a Convention to confess his undying love to his Best Friend! The downside is... Well, he dies. Painfully, I might add. He's Transported to Wandyra; A Land that seems to resemble the Anime World. It's up to you to guild him home (or not) and finally express his feelings for his friend! 

PROOF OF CONCEPT OUT NOW (5 Minute Plot Demo)

*Game is Currently In-Development
